pages.text: Next multiblock machine we will make is.....  The Distiller to turn normal water into Distilled Water. 1st Step to make Steam. these materials are required to make:          x7 Steel Scaffolding         x3 Fluid Pipes                x1 Redstone Engineering Block  x2 Light Engineering Block   x10 Iron Sheetmetals

pages.name: Distiller
pages.text: To form the structure, right click with Engineer's Hammer on the iron sheetmetal at the middle

To make Distilled Water, input the water from the right side and it need power to operate. After that open the GUI and you got Distilled Water, there are 2 outputs for the machine from the left and the back. Let's move on the next step - Boiler!
